article_title: A bargain no longer: Lancaster County health insurance costs approach national average
article_text: Tim Stuhldreher is a Lancaster Newspapers staff writer who covers business and finance. He can be reached at tstuhldreher@lnpnews.com or (717) 481-6137. You can also follow@timstuhldreher on Twitter.

article_metadata.author: TIM STUHLDREHER | Business Writer

og.description: Not that long ago, Lancaster County enjoyed consistently lower health insurance costs than the U.S. as a whole.
